comments.body:
This type isn't any, is the return value from the convict: 

https://github.com/mozilla/node-convict/blob/95f4ab398719d002a81b8acb21d2317b7bdbc8b6/packages/convict/src/main.js#L458-L703

The same applies for `ipaddress` and `url`
As we agreed, let's keep the same for interface compatibility

Should be a string instead of any according to:
https://github.com/validatorjs/validator.js/blob/master/src/lib/isEmail.js#62

The same applies for `ipaddress` and `url` as per:
https://github.com/validatorjs/validator.js/blob/master/src/lib/isURL.js#L49
https://github.com/validatorjs/validator.js/blob/master/src/lib/isIP.js#L35

It's the type definition from convict
https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/convict/index.d.ts
Ok, as we agreed, let's keep the same for interface compatibility.
